Research This project aims to approach 46.7 percent ultimate efficiency limit of a solar cell by using nanophotonic engineering. Based upon our recent paper (Nano Lett 16, 6467 2016), we will investigate tapered nanowire arrays. We intend to optimize the internal radiative efficiency by using proper surface passivation.
